name: Kaeya
description: In the Knights of Favonius, KaeyaÂ is the most trusted aide for the Acting Grand Master Jean. You can always count on him to solve any intractable problems. Everyone in Mondstadt loves Kaeya, but no one knows what secrets this witty, charming knight has...

skills.name: Ceremonial Bladework
skills.description:
Normal Attack: Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.

Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
Plunging Attack: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Frostgnaw
skills.description:
Unleashes a frigid blast, dealing Cryo DMG to opponents in front of Kaeya.

Generates 2.5 elemental particles when it hits at least 1 target.

skills.name: Glacial Waltz
skills.description:
Coalescing the frost in the air, Kaeya summons 3 icicles that revolve 4 times around him for 8 seconds.
These icicles will follow the character around and deal Cryo DMG to opponents in their path for so long as they persist.

passives.name: Cold-Blooded Strike
passives.description: Every hit with Frostgnaw regenerates HP for Kaeya equal to 15% of his ATK.

passives.name: Glacial Heart
passives.description: Opponents Frozen by Frostgnaw will drop additional Elemental Particles. Frostgnaw may only produce a maximum of 2 additional Elemental Particles per use.

passives.name: Hidden Strength
passives.description:
Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption of your characters in the party by 20%.

Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Excellent Blood
constellations.description: The CRIT Rate of Kaeya's Normal Attack and Charge Attacks against opponents affected by the Cryo is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Never-Ending Performance
constellations.description: Every time Glacial Waltz defeats an opponent, its duration is increased by 2.5s, up to a maximum of 15s. *The description is incorrect, duration extension takes effect on any enemy defeat, not just enemies defeated by Glacial Waltz.

constellations.name: Dance of Frost
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Frostgnaw by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Frozen Kiss
constellations.description:
Triggers automatically when Kaeya's HP falls below 20%:
Creates a shield that absorbs damage equal to 30% of Kaeya's Max HP. Lasts for 20s.
This shield absorbs Cryo DMG with 250% efficiency.
Can only occur once every 60s.

constellations.name: Frostbiting Embrace
constellations.description: Increases the level of Glacial Waltz by 3. Max upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Glacial Whirlwind
constellations.description: Glacial Waltz will generate 1 additional icicle, and will regenerate 15 Energy when cast.
